Hi, I am Popov Vadim, a graduate of a technical university majoring in ... studying computer science. This year I started my studies at Codecademy on Full-Stack Engineer and Data Scientist: Natural Language Processing Specialist course. Setting ambitious goals to graduate from them by the end of this 2024.

In my spare time I enjoy reading and learning chess, I love reading about scientific developments and their practical applications. I am raising two boys and helping them in learning math and computer science.

Interesting fact! I wrote my first program in 1992, that is ..... seconds ago!
